title: Bandwidth: God of War comes to GeForce Now, Luna Xbox Game Pass expands their catalog of games
content:
This week, NVIDIA GeForce Now is bringing some fan-favorite picks to its lineup of streamable games for you to finally play, such as the classic God of War. Amazon Luna, on the other hand, is adding some more titles to its gaming channels while Xbox Game Pass does the same.

moreâ€¦

The post Bandwidth: God of War comes to GeForce Now, Luna Xbox Game Pass expands their catalog of games appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: GeForce Now is adding a special game for many out there who want something fantastic to stream. This week, God of War comes to GeForce Now.
